reverseSneaking.comment: Timber Mod will ENABLE itself if you ARE sneaking if this value is true. Default: false.

enableMod.comment: Timber Mod will disable itself if this value is set to false. Default: true.

damageAxe.comment: Timber Mod will damage the axe for the amount of blocks chopped if this value is true. Default: true.

dropItems.comment: Timber Mod will drop items in creative mode aswell, true to enable, false to disable. Default: false.
